Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 70th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2019, off David Evens (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/2019, off Rigo Tafoya (BAL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2019, hitting .423 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/5/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $10,750,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York on 6/11/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2020, hitting .517 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against New York on 9/30/2020...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
